But currently this is not the case and this mod attempts to fix this problem.

They are all integrated seamlessly into the games levelled lists so they will appear on NPCs and in vendors. Some of them have new modifications on them aswell as existing Fallout 4 modifications.

State.Author: HcG x Grill and TheFriedturkey
